title: Surface charge-reinforced and ion-selective layers for stable metal zinc anode chemistry
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01260G, Paper
Zhiquan Wei, Shixun Wang, Dedi Li, Shuo Yang, Songde Guo, Guangmeng Qu, Yihan Yang, Hongfei Li
Surface charge-reinforced and ion-selective molecular layers on the Zn surface enable reversible Zn chemistry to suppress side reactions and dendrites.
